>Ah that sheds a bit of light on the problem, and like you said it shouldn't
>really be much of a problem (at least with smaller numbers of characters) on
>P2's and above, so I'm wondering what's causing the problems people are
>reporting with it freezing or slowing right down...another mysterious
>question.

Well, with n^2 types of things, that means even P2's and above could 
eventually get hit -- if 150 characters takes 225,000 units of time, 
something really big like 400 guys would take 1,600,000 ...

>Thanks for letting us know Tom :)

Sure thing :)

--Tom
